ygData.subject: Re: Hrmm
ygData.msgSnippet: Guys, look. I said that a what I wanted to do (which was just look around Ak Anon) could be done by a level 1 barbarian shaman just as easily as a level 50
ygData.messageBody:
Guys, look. I said that a what I wanted to do (which was just look around
Ak'Anon) could be done by a level 1 barbarian shaman just as easily as a
level 50 wizard or somethnig could do it, I was only giving an example.
Barbarian shamans have nothing to do with this.

>Barbarians get caught in our town, so if a barbarian shaman found the clue
>it is
>very unlikely in akanon. Because my friend is a shaman and due to game
>bugs has
>had to gate out of akanon almost every time he entered it.
>
>
